hero.title: Mazu Brand Story
hero.subtitle: Inheriting Mazu spirit, protecting marine ecology, bringing you the purest deliciousness

story.title: The Heat of Stone Pot, Carrying Mazu's Protection
story.subtitle: Inspired by Taiwan's Mazu faith, traditional stone hot pot combines diverse spicy flavors, bringing Taiwanese hot and steaming happiness.
story.content1: The name 'Mazu' comes from the sea god faith in Taiwan's coastal areas, which has had a major impact on marine culture and is called Mazu culture.
story.content2: Mazu is regarded as the 'protector of the nation and people' sea guardian, just as we hope to accompany each customer with a bowl of hot and steaming stone hot pot, bringing peace and warmth.
story.content3: Mazu takes 'spicy' as fragrance and 'cooking' as method, inheriting the passion of Taiwanese hot pot. From stone hot pot with fragrant ingredients, classic spicy soup base, to sesame oil, sesame sauce, sesame and other diverse spicy flavors, extending to rich individual hot pot choices. Whether it's dinner for one, small gatherings, or takeout and delivery, Mazu can become an economical and quality daily good taste.

hero.title2: Warming More People with a Bowl of Hot Food

origin.title: Our Original Intention
origin.text: Inspired by Taiwan's sea god faith 'Mazu' protective spirit, we use dining as a medium to long-term focus on rural and disadvantaged needs, connecting social resources through replicable dining charity programs, making warmth continuously circulate.

visually_impaired.title: Visually & Hearing Impaired
visually_impaired.text: With original disability certificate, the person and one accompanying relative dining together and consuming any hot pot, Mazu will treat you to any flavor MINI pot. (Choose one from Cherry Duck, Snowflake Beef, Lamb, Plum Pork)

medical_staff.title: Medical Staff
medical_staff.text: With original medical staff license certificate, the person and one accompanying relative dining together and consuming, enjoy 50% off second pot of any hot pot. (Discount applies to lower-priced item)

filial_piety.title: Filial Piety
filial_piety.text: Family dining with parents, paid by adult children, photographed by service staff, and agreeing to appear on Mazu MINI Spicy Pot fan page, receive free shrimp. (Limit one per consumption)

matsu_resident.title: Matsu Residents
matsu_resident.text: With original Matsu area ID/fisherman certificate, consume any hot pot in store, receive free clams. (Limit one per consumption)

new_resident.title: New Residents
new_resident.text: New residents with valid Taiwan residence permit, consume any meal in store, enjoy crispy stinky tofu for only NT$19. (Limit one per consumption)

beach_cleanup.title: Mountain & Sea Guardian Action
beach_cleanup.text: With current year beach cleanup/handmade trail proof, consume any hot pot in store and check-in, receive free Angus beef. (Limit one per consumption)

allpass.title: Student ALLPASS
allpass.text: Graduate and college students, with last semester ALLPASS transcript, consume in store and check-in, receive free fried chicken wing. (Once per semester)

guidelines.title: Important Notes
items: These offers are for dine-in only, takeout and delivery not applicable.
Above offers are mutually exclusive, cannot be combined with other promotions.
Company reserves the right to modify activity items.
Actual items provided subject to store availability, no exchanges or cash refunds.
guidelines.note: Applicable stores: Will be continuously updated on this page.

milestones.title: Achievement Milestones
milestones.subtitle1: Total accumulated discount amount since 2021 to current month
milestones.subtitle2: Accumulated social feedback various discount amounts

items.a: Please actively present certificates, screenshots or activity vouchers before ordering. Cannot be processed after meal.

items.q: Can I use two offers simultaneously?
items.a: Unless otherwise noted, offers cannot be combined.

items.q: Are delivery platforms or takeout eligible?
items.a: Except for special voucher notes, charity offers are dine-in/self-pickup only.

items.q: What certificates can be used for medical/new resident/student offers?
items.a: Medical staff need medical license; new residents need residence permit; students need student ID and transcript; others as announced.
Some are long-term projects, some are seasonal limited; subject to this page announcements.
